com.brightbots.box

Class BoxAuth

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.brightbots.box.BoxAuth

  • @Component
public class BoxAuth
extends java.lang.Object
    This class create the main connection to the Box API for subsequent consumptions.

    By Brightbots Inc. All rights reserved.

    Since:
    2022-01-24
    Version:
    1.0

    Cristian Perez
